title: Field Trial Study Data Resource
description: Field Trial Study Data Resource is a specification for detailing a Sstudy

profile.title: Profile
profile.context: Every Package and Resource descriptor has a profile. The default profile, if none is declared, is `data-package` for Package and `data-resource` for Resource.

id.title: Id
id.description: The unique identifier of this field trial.
id.context: This is ideally a url-usable and human-readable name. Name `SHOULD` be invariant, meaning it `SHOULD NOT` change when its parent descriptor is updated.

name.title: Name
name.context: This is ideally a url-usable and human-readable name. Name `SHOULD` be invariant, meaning it `SHOULD NOT` change when its parent descriptor is updated.

trial.title: Trial
trial.description: The name of the field trial that this study is a part of.

location.title: Location
location.description: The name of the location where this study took place.

curator_name.title: Curator Name
curator_name.description: The name of the person curating this data.

curator_email.title: Curator Email
curator_email.description: The email address of the person curating this data.

contact_name.title: Contact Name
contact_name.description: The name of the person to contact about this data.

contact_email.title: Contact Email
contact_email.description: The email address of the person to contact about this data.

sowing_date.title: Sowing Date
sowing_date.description: The date when the seeds were sown in the field.

harvest_date.title: Harvest Date
harvest_date.description: The date when the seeds were harvested from the field.

description.title: Description

design.title: Design
design.description: Information about the design of the Study.

growing_conditions.title: Growing Conditionts
growing_conditions.description: The Growing Conditions of the Study.

phenotype_notes.title: Phenotype Gathering Notese
phenotype_notes.description: Any information relating to how phenotypes were taken..

weather.title: Weather
weather.description: A web link to see any details of the weather relating to the study.

crop.title: Crop
crop.description: The previous crop grown at the location of the Study.

previous_crop.title: Previous Crop
previous_crop.description: The previous crop grown at the location of the Study.

ph_min.title: pH Minimum
ph_min.description: The minimum value of the pH of the soil for this Study.

ph_max.title: pH Maximum
ph_max.description: The maximum value of the pH of the soil for this Study.

soil.title: Soil
soil.description: Any details about the soil at the Study.

link.title: Website
link.description: A website with further details about the study.

plots_gps.title: Plots GPS
plots_gps.description: The GeoJSON for the Study's plots layout.

aspect.title: Aspect
aspect.description: The direction that the study is facing.

licenses.title: Licenses
licenses.description: The license(s) under which this package is published.

items.title: License

name.title: Open Definition license identifier
name.description: MUST be an Open Definition license identifier, see http://licenses.opendefinition.org/

path.title: Path
path.description: A fully qualified URL, or a POSIX file path..
path.context: Implementations need to negotiate the type of path provided, and dereference the data accordingly.

items.context: Use of this property does not imply that the person was the original creator of, or a contributor to, the data in the descriptor, but refers to the composition of the descriptor itself.

licenses.context: This property is not legally binding and does not guarantee that the package is licensed under the terms defined herein.
